tool_description: converts youtube channel urls to rss
name: youtube to rss
title: youtube to rss

api_list.name: convert
api_list.description: converts youtube channel url to rss url
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-to-rss.p.rapidapi.com/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-to-rss.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-to-rss.p.rapidapi.com/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-to-rss.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
